description: Parties that have ratified/acceded the Agreement for the Implementation of the Provisions of the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea of 10 December 1982 relating to the Conservation and Management of Straddling Fish Stocks and Highly Migratory Fish Stocks (UN Fish Stocks Agreement), in the Americas as of March 2020.  The Agreement was adopted on 4 August 1995 and entered into force on 11 November 2001.
name: CLME: UN Fish Stocks Agreement Ratification Status
